name: Aragon Workshop
description:
DAO DIY: Brew your own DAO!

Ready to dive into the wild world of decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs)? Join us for a workshop where you'll learn to brew your very own Aragon DAO!

What's in store for you:
Explore the basics of blockchain technology.
Craft your personalized Aragon DAO from scratch.
Conjure up governance plugins for your community.

Get ready for a hands-on experience! We'll guide you through the arts of DAO creation, helping you to emerge as a DAO master.
